| History                 = Wacker Studios produced the TV show ''Cap'n Marvel'', based on the life of [[Carol Danvers (Earth-616)|Carol Danvers]], aka [[Captain Marvel]], and directed by [[Jayson Jay (Earth-616)|Jayson Jay]]. The profits of the show went to help the funding for the [[Alpha Flight (Space Program) (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight]] space initiative.{{r|Mighty Captain Marvel Vol 1 1}}

| Trivia                  = * Wacker Studios is named after former ''Captain Marvel'' editor [[Stephen Wacker]].
